/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. A blue fence runs along the side of the road, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
